title: Case-Based Learning Design for Resolving Elementary Classroom Management Dilemmas

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational theory knowledge and basic classroom management techniques
context.additional_context: A case-based learning environment focusing on analyzing and resolving various dilemma situations that may occur in actual elementary classrooms

learning_goals: Learners can analyze at least five typical dilemma cases occurring in elementary classrooms
Learners can apply a case-based problem-solving framework to propose solutions tailored to real-world situations
Learners can improve and reflect on their problem-solving strategies through peer feedback
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
